content:
Peter Johnstone (chair of the CT steering committee) writes:

We have no CT meeting planned for summer 2022: the people in Louvain-la-Neuve were originally hoping to organize one, but they have had to postpone it to 2023.

These things are run by people who have do a lot of work, so you can't count on them happening if you don't do the work yourself!

John Baez said:

Peter Johnstone (chair of the CT steering committee) writes:

We have no CT meeting planned for summer 2022: the people in Louvain-la-Neuve were originally hoping to organize one, but they have had to postpone it to 2023.

These things are run by people who have do a lot of work, so you can't count on them happening if you don't do the work yourself!

Where does he write it?
In email to someone who needed to know.

I figured it was worthwhile letting people know. Maybe it's not too late for someone to take over from the folks at Louvain-la-Neuve. But of course if anyone wants to host CT2022, they should start by talking to Johnstone!
If anyone who's reading this ends up organising CT next year, please talk to me (as organiser of ACT) for coordination of dates - ours are going to be fixed first
